page.title: 12Thirsk and Sowerby Amateurs
page.content: Thirsk has never had a theatre. There were only travelling theatrical companies. Lately{York Theatre Royal have started touring the small towns of North Yorkshire and have recently played{A Comedy of Errors}in the Town Hall. Various schools, churches and other amateur groups have put on plays over the years, but the principal dramatic society has been{Thirsk and {Sowerby Amateurs}who have been performing for 5O years. They usually put on comedies but they also put on thrillers, musicals and straight plays.Some of the plays they have put on have been{Ring around the {Moon, Murder in the Cathedral}and{The {Insect Play.}Each year they put on a pantomime and for the last few years they have staged 'pop' song and dance shows featuring young people.Their next show is{The King and I. N.Morris
